traits.locale_text: Deals 8-15 Toxic damage with 15 armour penetration within the area and inflicts melting on targets for 2 rounds.

Deals <u>(from 25 to 50)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and inflicts +3 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

Deals <u>(from 25 to 50)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and inflicts +3 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

Deals <u>(from 25 to 50)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and inflicts 3 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
If the target has {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} this grenade, only 1 stack of melting is inflicted.

traits.locale_text: Наносит <u>(от 25 до 50)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 20%, а также накладывает +3 уровня {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}плавления{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.
Наносит 8–15 токсичного урона по области и накладывает на цели эффект плавления на 2 раунда. Пробитие брони составляет 15%.
